citation: Proclamation under the Roads and Jetties Act 1935 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Roads and Jetties Act 1935

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 52A of the Roads and Jetties Act 1935 –

        (a) amend the proclamation notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 1997, No. 52 by omitting from Schedule 1 "Plans 3702, 3703, 3704, 3705 and 3706" and substituting "Plans 3702, 3704, 3705, 3706 and 9929"; and
        (b) further amend that proclamation by omitting the table from Schedule 2 and substituting the following table:
                               Location                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
            Item  Description                                                                     1.  Forest Road – south side  0.01  2.  Tarrants Road – south side  0.14  3.  Bridgeview Road – south side  0.35  4.  Turners Road – south side  0.73  5.  Rowbottoms Road – south side  2.22  6.  Private access – south side  2.58  7.  Access road – south side  2.93  8.  Access road – south side  10.71  9.  Molesworth Road – south side  11.72
                               (Distance in kilometres from the eastern boundary of Forest Road)                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        
            
            (c) revoke the proclamation notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 2011, No. 106; and
            (d) declare that this proclamation takes effect on the day upon which its making is notified in the Gazette.
    4 August 2015

    C. WARNER

    Governor

    By Her Excellency's Command,

    M. T. (RENE) HIDDING

    Minister for Infrastructure

    Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

    Notified in the Gazette on 12 August 2015

    This proclamation is administered in the Department of State Growth.
